SEARCH
Package pt.uc.dei.dtos

Class NotificationMessageDTO

java.lang.Object
pt.uc.dei.dtos.NotificationMessageDTO
public class NotificationMessageDTO extends Object
Data Transfer Object (DTO) representing a notification. Contains details such as notification type, content, timestamps, and recipient information.

  • Field Details

    • id

      @NotNull(message="Notification ID is required") private @NotNull(message="Notification ID is required") Long id
      The unique identifier for the notification. Must always be sent.

    • type

      @NotBlank(message="Notification type missing") private @NotBlank(message="Notification type missing") String type
      The type of the notification. Must always be sent and must not be blank.

    • content

      @NotBlank(message="Content missing") private @NotBlank(message="Content missing") String content
      The content of the notification. Must always be sent and must not be blank.
